attributes.action: Stop live pig export to the Netherlands.
attributes.additional_details:
These surplus supplies of pigs were created by mass farming.  Encouraged by the government and made worse by Brexit.
It is their responsibility to ensure welfare standards will be applied having agreed a bill which was promised in their Manifesto to do awat with this.
attributes.background:
The government needs to review this new practice in the light of the proposed Animal Welfare bill. 
It needs to clarify why this is suddenly acceptable without any clarification of methods of transport, monitoring and slaughter.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the export of livestock, but we're not sure what new practice you are referring to. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
